main_definition: To be linked or joined together in some way, often referring to relationships between people or things.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having a relationship or connection with someone.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is connected to her family through social media.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physically linked by cable, fiber optics, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: The two houses are connected by an underground Ethernet cable.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Made or having a common origin or source.
meanings_and_examples.example: These ideas are all connected to the same theory.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having knowledge about various topics due to exposure or experience.
meanings_and_examples.example: He is well-connected in the business world and knows many influential people.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a network of things, places, or people; part of an interrelated system.
meanings_and_examples.example: The different components are all connected to form a complete machine.
